com.knowgate.stripes

Class BaseStripesBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.knowgate.stripes.BaseStripesBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.sourceforge.stripes.action.ActionBean
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseAjaxBean

    public abstract class BaseStripesBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.sourceforge.stripes.action.ActionBean

    Base class for beans serving a response to be used as HTML page data

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergio Montoro Ten
    See Also:
    Stripes

      • getPageName

        public java.lang.String getPageName()

        Call HttpServletRequest.getServletPath() and return the substring after the last slash / and before the first hash # after the slash (if present).

        Returns:
        String

      • getResource

        public java.lang.String getResource(java.lang.String key,
                                    java.lang.String... params)

        Get string resource from the associated ResourceBundle and replace {n} parameter with given values.

        Parameters must be numbered starting with 1. So at the resource bundle the resource will look like:

        key=Phrase with parameter {1} and {2}
        Parameters:
        key - String Resource name
        params - String[] Parameter values
        Returns:
        String

      • getResourceAsStringBuffer

        public java.lang.StringBuffer getResourceAsStringBuffer(java.lang.String fileName)
                                                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                        java.io.IOException

        Call ServletContect.getResourceAsStream() and convert the returned InputStream into a StringBuffer.

        Parameters:
        fileName - String Name of resource file to be read.
        Returns:
        StringBuffer
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • getResourceAsStringBuffer

        public java.lang.StringBuffer getResourceAsStringBuffer(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                        java.lang.String language)
                                                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                        java.io.IOException

        Get localized resource file as StringBuffer.

        Parameters:
        fileName - String Prefix of of resource file to be read.
        language - String Language code. It is expected to be appended after the file name with an underscore like "fileName_es" or "fileName_fr"
        Returns:
        StringBuffer
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • getCookie

        public java.lang.String getCookie(java.lang.String cookieName)

        Get value of cookie from HttpServletRequest

        Cookie value must be ISO8859_1 encoded.

        Parameters:
        cookieName - String
        Returns:
        String

      • setCookie

        public void setCookie(java.lang.String cookieName,
                      java.lang.String cookieValue)

        Set value of cookie. The supplied string value will be ISO8859_1 encoded.

        Parameters:
        cookieName - String
        cookieValue - String

      • getLastUrl

        public java.lang.String getLastUrl()

        Concatenate attributes javax.servlet.forward.request_uri and javax.servlet.forward.path_info, then append parameter key=value pairs.

        Returns:
        String request_uri + path_info + ? param1=value1 & param1=value1 …

      • errorsToXML

        public java.lang.String errorsToXML(java.util.Collection<net.sourceforge.stripes.validation.SimpleError> errors)

        Get error collection as XML String like:

        <errors count="1"/> <error field=\"field_name">Error Message</error> </errors>
        Parameters:
        errors - Collection<SimpleError>
        Returns:
        String
